Writing to Publish

Aside from writing essays and curating collections of purposeful stories about people living a meaningful life through experience - our goal is to publish our own works.

We travel and write about it to inspire families to redefine something “impossible” - as achievable. Here are our book goals:

Search For The Perfect Taco

In 2014, Dad set out to write a deeply social book, called "Here's To The Crazy Ones". But supporting a family while traveling full time comes with many challenges, and the opportunities that arose gave way to a new vision. This book is a tribute to the miracle of family, friends, and the experiences we have with and without them. It's a story about a family who ventures out into the world in search of the perfect taco, together, and the people and places it leads them to.

Culinary Alchemy

Our family is passionate about food - from the ingredients, methods, experience, and taste - we love to shop, prepare, cook and eat! And, we are good at it. As a family who travels full time and cares deeply about our nutrition and the people who helped bring it to the table, it took a lot of experimenting to create a healthy practice we could follow anywhere and anytime. This book is all about sharing the best we have found, from all over the world, to help you and your family eat well and be happy.
